topic.title: Control File Content Before Being Sent to Content Fusion

body.p: A cf-file protocol can be used when a customizer wants to control the content of files before they are sent to Content Fusion and the content that is saved in the original files after "Ge Changes" is performed. To use this feature you must:

ol.li: Set the com.oxygenxml.use.cffile.protocol system property to true. This will make the Oxygen Content Fusion Connector to use the cf-file protocol when requesting the file content or when trying to save the modified content back to the files.
Implement an URLStreamHandlerPluginExtension to impose the URL stream handlers for cf-file protocol
